votebox.middle.view

Class LayoutParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • votebox.middle.view.LayoutParser

  • public class LayoutParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the layout XML parser. The layout xml stores view information -- it defines a set of pages, each which defines a set of widgets (label, button, togglebutton, etc.) which have been arranged on the page for some purpose (display a candidate's name, display a "next page" button, etc.). This class's job is translate this information into a Layout object. This class might be better thought of as a Layout deserializer, but we have avoided this term so as not to mislead the reader into thinking that we are using java object serialization.

    To deserialize a Layout object, this class first uses java's xerces wrapper to parse a given layout xml file into a w3c dom tree. This dom tree is first validated with our schema and then interpreted recursively from the top down.

    It is important to note that for any given ballot package there are multiple layout files. Each layout file is representative of one (size, language) tuple. The layout parser will need to know which layout file needs to be parsed -- when you ask for a layout, you need to tell the parser which size and language you desire.

    • Method Detail

      • getLayout

        public Layout getLayout(IBallotVars vars,
               int size,
               java.lang.String lang,
               IView view)
                 throws LayoutParserException
        This is the core method for the layout parser. Call this method to translate a layout xml file to a dom tree (as an intermediate representation), then, primarily, to a ballot object.
        Parameters:
        vars - This method needs to know where to look for xml files and media. It gets this information from this parameter
        size - The parser needs to know which layout xml file to read. This parameter specifies the size index.
        lang - The parser needs to know which layout xml file to read. This paramter specifies the language.
        Returns:
        This method returns the Layout object which represents the parsed and translated layout xml file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This method throws if the xml file or schema could not be read, if the schema did not validate, or upon further testing of our own, the layout content is not valid.
        LayoutParserException

      • parseLayout

        private Layout parseLayout(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                 IView view)
                    throws LayoutParserException
        This method interprets a given dom node as being of the layout type. This method will convert the given dom node to a Layout object
        Parameters:
        node - This is the dom node that is interpreted as being of type layout *
        Returns:
        This method returns the newly constructed Layout object.
        Throws:
        LayoutParserException

      • parsePage

        private RenderPage parsePage(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                   IView view)
                      throws LayoutParserException
        This method is a helper to parseLayout. This method converts a dom node into a RenderPage object.
        Parameters:
        node - This is the page node which is interpreted as a page.
        Returns:
        This method returns the RenderPage object that represents the given dom page.
        Throws:
        LayoutParserException

      • parseToggleGroup

        private void parseToggleGroup(java.util.ArrayList<IDrawable> list,
                    org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                    IView view)
                       throws LayoutParserException
        This method is a helper to parsePage. This method converts a dom node into a ToggleButtonGroup.
        Parameters:
        list - This method will add all children toggle buttons to this list of togglebuttons, as membership in a group does not place toggle buttons as members of the layout. Groups only serve the purpose of implenting select/deselect strategies.
        node - This is the node that is interpreted as the toggle button group.
        Throws:
        LayoutParserException

      • parseDrawable

        private IDrawable parseDrawable(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                      ToggleButtonGroup group,
                      IView view)
                         throws LayoutParserException
        This method is a helper to parseToggleGroup and to parsePage. This method converts a dom node into an IDrawable.
        Parameters:
        node - This is the node which will be interpreted as an IDrawable.
        group - This is the group that this node needs to belong to. Pass null here if this drawable does not belong to a group (or if a group makes no sense -- IE label, etc.)
        Returns:
        This method returns the newly constructed drawable which represents the given dom node.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This method throws if its helpers throw or if one of its children is not a property.
        LayoutParserException

      • parseProperties

        private void parseProperties(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                   Properties properties)
                      throws LayoutParserException
        This is a helper method to parseLayout and parseElement. It is called when a dom node is encountered that represents a property. This method will add an entry representative of the given dom node to a given Properties object
        Parameters:
        node - This is the dom node which represents a property
        properties - This is the Properties object to which the given property should be added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This method throws an exception if the property has been defined with an incorrect type.
        LayoutParserException

      • parseListProperties

        private void parseListProperties(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                       Properties properties)
                          throws LayoutParserException
        Given an XML node whose type is "ListProperty", add all its children to the given Properties instance.
        Parameters:
        node - This is the list property node.
        properties - Add the children of the given node to this properties instance.
        Throws:
        BallotParserException - If the XML is not formatted correctly, this method will throw.
        LayoutParserException
